(12) Challenges for API Products

  • Productization: APIs must be useful, findable, usable, and predictable
  • Adoption: API design familiarity allows for easier adoption
  • Velocity: Improving an API allows to grow the value rate
  • Breaking changes: Breaking changes fragment the consumer population


Why? APIs Unlock Value! Erik Wilde (@dret): API Governance

(18) API Landscape Value



What? Cultivate API Landscapes! Erik Wilde (@dret): API Governance

(19) Challenges for API Landscapes

  • Productization: Manage all APIs by balancing autonomy and coordination
  • Innovation: Allow new patterns and practices to evolve
  • Coordination: Prevent bottlenecks created by centralized processes
  • Stability: Complex dependencies can create stability challenges
  • Coherence: Balance local vs. global optimization


How? Observe, Harmonize, Support

Outline (How? Observe, Harmonize, Support)

  2. Why? APIs Unlock Value! [10]

How? Observe, Harmonize, Support Erik Wilde (@dret): API Governance

(21) Observe with Insights: API the APIs

  • Make introspection part of the API landscape
  • Combine decentralization with the ability for gaining insights
  • APIs can be described in a variety of ways
    • Technical descriptions for interface mechanics (e.g., OpenAPI [https://www.openapis.org/])
    • Documentation intended for human consumption
    • Metadata for API lifecycle management (e.g., schema.org [https://schema.org/WebAPI])


How? Observe, Harmonize, Support Erik Wilde (@dret): API Governance

(22) API Visibility: Inside-Out vs. Outside-In



How? Observe, Harmonize, Support Erik Wilde (@dret): API Governance

(23) Harmonize with Interfaces: Provide Clear Guidance

  • Aim for the minimal number of constraints for your API landscape
    • Minimizing constraints maximizes the freedom of teams
    • Revisit existing constraints and remove/relax them when possible
  • Look at rules as suggestions how to satisfy constraints
    • Help teams to satisfy constraints if they want/need help
    • Try to make rules optional whenever possible


How? Observe, Harmonize, Support Erik Wilde (@dret): API Governance

(24) Support with Nudging: Help to do Things Right



How? Observe, Harmonize, Support Erik Wilde (@dret): API Governance

(25) API Guidelines as Shared Practices

  • Larger API landscapes mean more ways to solve the same problem
    • Solving API problems is not what teams should focus on
    • Solving API problems in a consistent way helps the API landscape
  • Make it easy to do the right thing by providing support
    • Tooling can validate APIs and increase API product quality
    • Tooling can simplify implementation and reduce API time-to-market
    • Tooling can help with consumption and increase realized API value


How? Observe, Harmonize, Support Erik Wilde (@dret): API Governance

Conclusions Erik Wilde (@dret): API Governance

(28) Lifecycle Management at Landscape Level

  • API Lifecycle Management helps with improving API value
  • API Governance helps with improving API landscape value
  • Focus on improving UX at the API landscape level
    • UX can be improved by good API DX
    • UX can be improved by good API landscape DX


Conclusions Erik Wilde (@dret): API Governance
